PreceptDef.label: volatile
PreceptDef.description:
We won't let our fragile egos dictate our lives. We refuse to be shackled by the thin veil of reality. We will peer beyond.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonist mood will fluctuate every day at random between -15 and +15.

thoughtStageDescriptions.li: Clown in the sky looking at me
I can feel the inside of my skin

li.label: spiders in my face
li.description: Did you know you swallow at least two spiders every night? I enjoy it. They taste like cinnamon.

li.label: clown in the sky looking at me
li.description: There is a stern-looking clown dressed like a pirate looking at me, licking his lips. It craves my attention.

li.label: liquorice tastes like betrayal
li.description: I have been betrayed by my fiercest enemy: croutons. They will be slaughtered by the thousands.

li.label: the voices won't stop
li.description: They could be telling me to kill everyone, but instead they recite stock exchange transactions in ancient languages. A beet smiles upon my portfolio.

li.label: I feel like turpentine
li.description: It's a slick feeling, like a raspy cat's tongue licking the inside of my organs. It reminds me of my grandma's stew.

li.label: all cheese is obnoxious
li.description: Specially blue cheese. It refuses to let other people talk and interrupts constantly.

li.label: have you ever seen tomorrow?
li.description: It's blue. All blue. With hints of a colour that is between stygian blue and hyperbolic orange.

li.label: I can feel the inside of my skin
li.description: It feels like home. I can even see the fireplace burning with the smell of freshly baked kerosene.
